content.rendered:
Pop Up Displays

Las Vegas trade show pop up displays come in different sizes for display at the Las Vegas Convention Center, Sands Expo, or Mandalay Bay Convention Center.  These trade show displays come in the popular 8ft straight pop up display, 8ft curved pop up display and the 8ft wave pop up display . The fabric pop up displays also come in the 10ft fabric pop up display, 10ft fabric straight pop up display and the 10ft fabric curved pop up display.. Las Vegas trade show pop up displays are perfect for the background for vendor booths as they are easily seen and are a full color display that can have your products, pictures, and logos on the fabric print. The fabric itself can be printed any color or combination of colors to match your marketing needs and is wrinkle free. The pop up displays can be used over and over again at different venues and are machine washable so they will look new and fresh at every event. Best of all, you can order new fabric displays at a much lower price for your pop up display since you already own the set up for your display and the fabric print merely goes over this display and is stretched slightly to make it wrinkle free.

Las Vegas pop up displays are easy to set up and come with their own carrying case to make for easy transportation to events and shows. By walking into the convention or trade show venue with your own display, you can save hundreds  of dollars in expensive union labor. Pop up displays can be set up by one or two people in a few minutes and disassembled quickly after an event is over.
